text: Nicholas Kroll (born June 5, 1978) is an American actor, comedian, producer and writer. He is known for creating and starring in the Comedy Central series Kroll Show, The Oh, Hello Show, the FX comedy series The League, and starring in and co-creating in the animated Netflix series Big Mouth. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from New York (state) Category:People from Rye, New York Category:Screenwriters from New York (state)
title: Nick Kroll
